Package matrix

Class Matrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • matrix.Matrix
  • public class Matrix
extends java.lang.Object
    A class representing a Matrix, the operations that can either be used by a Matrix or on a Matrix, and the different forms or decompositions that a Matrix can have.
    Version:
    4-17-19
    Author:
    Brendan Caudill

      Matrix add​(Matrix source)
      Addition of two matrixes (C = A + B) I consider it fairly novel to use the void Matrix addition to add two matrices into default value matrix.

              int totalColumns)
        The Matrix constructor, creates a matrix with all elements set to 0
        Parameters:
        totalRows - the amount of rows the matrix will have.
        totalColumns - the amount of columns the matrix will have.

      • Matrix

        public Matrix​(Matrix A,
              Matrix B)
        The Matrix Augmentation constructor
        Parameters:
        A - The matrix for the left side of the augmented matrix
        B - The matrix for the right side of the augmented matrix

      • addTo

        Addition to a matrix (A = A + B, plus-equals)
        Parameters:

      • add

        public Matrix add​(Matrix source)
        Addition of two matrixes (C = A + B) I consider it fairly novel to use the void Matrix addition to add two matrices into default value matrix.
        Parameters:
        source - the matrix to sum with this matrix
        Returns:
        the sum of this matrix and the matrix provided

      • subtractFrom

        public void subtractFrom​(Matrix source)
        Subtraction from a matrix (A = A - B, minus-equals)
        Parameters:
        source - Matrix B, The matrix to subtract from this matrix

      • subtract

        public Matrix subtract​(Matrix source)
        Subtraction of two matrixes (C = A - B)
        Parameters:
        source - Matrix B, the matrix to subtract from this matrix
        Returns:
        the difference of this matrix and the matrix provided

        public boolean hasSameDimensions​(Matrix source)
        Determines if the instance of matrix has the same dimensions of another provided matrix.
        Parameters:
        source - the matrix to compare to
        Returns:
        true if the matrices have the same dimensions, false otherwise

      • dotProduct

        public Matrix dotProduct​(Matrix multiplicand)
        Dot product of two matrixes, A * B = AB
        Parameters:
        multiplicand - The second matrix multiplicand, Matrix B.
        Returns:
        the product matrix, Matrix AB. (Will have A's rows and B's columns)

      • canBeMultipliedWith

        public boolean canBeMultipliedWith​(Matrix multiplicand)
        Determins if this matrix can be multiplied by a given other matrix.
        Parameters:
        multiplicand - the matrix to check this matrix against.
        Returns:
        true if the two matrices are compatible for a dot product, false otherwise

        public boolean isInvertible()
        Tells whether or not a Matrix is invertible.
        Returns:
        True if matrix is invertible, false otherwise

      • doLUFactorization

        private void doLUFactorization​(Matrix L,
                               Matrix U,
                               Matrix P)
        Performs LU factorization using Doolittle's method. Will not work for a Matrix that needs row swaps to be factorizable.
        Parameters:
        L - Matrix to store the lower triangular result
        U - Matrix to store the upper triangular result
        P - Matrix to store the permutation matrix for row swaps

      • getLDecomposition

        public Matrix getLDecomposition()
        Returns the lower triangular decomposition on a matrix.
        Returns:
        the lower triangular matrix

      • getUDecomposition

        public Matrix getUDecomposition()
        Returns the upper triangular decomposition on a matrix.
        Returns:
        the upper triangular matrix

      • getPermutationMatrix

        public Matrix getPermutationMatrix()
        Returns the permutation matrix for the LU decomposition of this matrix.
        Returns:
        the permutation matrix

        public double getDeterminant()
        Finds the determinant of a matrix.
        Returns:
        the determinant of the matrix
